rules_text:
Vanishing 10
If you would lose 1 or more life other than to pay a cost, instead remove that many time counters from Serene Prayer. [i](If you would lose more life than there are time counters on Serene Prayer, the life loss is still prevented.)[/i]
notes:
!vanishing
!inpend Vanishing 10/add/ (This permanent enters with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
